Type.Name: StateType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StateType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The possible types of states of an object

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Active = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates a window is currently the active window

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Animated = int32(37)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Armed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the object is armed

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Busy = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Indicates the current object is busy

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Checked = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is currently checked

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Default = int32(36)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Defunct = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Indicates the user interface object corresponding to this object no longer exists

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Editable = int32(6)

Docs.summary: Indicates the user can change the contents of this object

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Enabled = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Indicates that this object is enabled. An inconsistent is an example of an object which is sensitive but not enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Expandable = int32(8)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object allows progressive disclosure of its children

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Expanded = int32(9)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object its expanded

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Focusable = int32(10)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object can accept keyboard focus, which means all events resulting from typing on the keyboard will normally be passed to it when it has focus

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Focused = int32(11)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object currently has the keyboard focus

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Horizontal = int32(12)

Docs.summary: Indicates the orientation of this object is horizontal

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Iconified = int32(13)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is minimized and is represented only by an icon

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Indeterminate = int32(30)

Docs.summary: Indicates that a check box is in a state other than checked or not checked.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Invalid = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates an invalid state

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType InvalidEntry = int32(33)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType LastDefined = int32(39)

Docs.summary: Not a valid state, used for finding end of enumeration

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType ManagesDescendants = int32(29)

Docs.summary: Indicates that "active-descendant-changed" event is sent when children become 'active' (i.e. are selected or navigated to onscreen). Used to prevent need to enumerate all children in very large containers, like tables.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Modal = int32(14)

Docs.summary: Indicates something must be done with this object before the user can interact with an object in a different window

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType MultiLine = int32(15)

Docs.summary: Indicates this (text) object can contain multiple lines of text

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Multiselectable = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object allows more than one of its children to be selected at the same time

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Opaque = int32(17)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object paints every pixel within its rectangular region

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Pressed = int32(18)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is currently pressed

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Required = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Indicates that explicit user interaction with an object is required by the user interface, e.g. a required field in a "web-form" interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Resizable = int32(19)

Docs.summary: Indicates the size of this object is not fixed

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Selectable = int32(20)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is the child of an object that allows its children to be selected and that this child is one of those children that can be selected

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType SelectableText = int32(35)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Selected = int32(21)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is the child of an object that allows its children to be selected and that this child is one of those children that has been selected

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Sensitive = int32(22)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is sensitive

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Showing = int32(23)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object, the object's parent, the object's parent's parent, and so on, are all visible

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType SingleLine = int32(24)

Docs.summary: Indicates this (text) object can contain only a single line of text

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Stale = int32(25)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the index associated with this object has changed since the user accessed the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType SupportsAutocompletion = int32(34)

Docs.summary: To be added.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Transient = int32(26)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is transient

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Truncated = int32(31)

Docs.summary: Indicates that an object is truncated, e.g. a text value in a speradsheet cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Vertical = int32(27)

Docs.summary: Indicates the orientation of this object is vertical

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Visible = int32(28)

Docs.summary: Indicates this object is visible

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Atk.StateType Visited = int32(38)

Docs.summary: To be added.
